result.title: Is there an offline judge for test data?
result.content: There are lot of competitions which do not allow to submit your solution after contest's end(CEOI,COCI,IOI...), but they publish test data. I think it is very hard to manually compare output data with diff and it would be much more simpler if there was program for that. Isn't there something like that? Isn't there a nice coder who could code that for us? :D :D Sorry for english.
